danish_publication: Der går en landmåler ved Torsbjærg her vesten for Vorde kirke. Han har sat nogle skjel forkert. Mange folk har hørt, at han går og slæber med hans kjæde hver nat. En mørk morgen, jeg skulde hen at flytte heste og er på hjemvejen, hører jeg en forskrækkelig raslen af en kjæde. Nu havde jeg hørt de gamle fortællinger og er aldrig bleven så ræd som den gang. Men da jeg kom nærmere til det, opdagede jeg, at det var præstens hund.
english_publication: There is a land surveyor who haunts near Torsbjærg, west of Vorde church. He had placed some boundaries incorrectly. Many people have heard him dragging his chain every night. One dark morning, I was supposed to move the horses and I was on my way home, I heard a horrible rattling of a chain. Now I'd heard the old stories and never been as scared as I was then. But when I got closer to it, I discovered it was the minister's dog.
